direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The heat waves momentarily obscure our view as the F/A-18s take to the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President is deeply contemplative.  Constance sits down next to him.  She knows what he's thinking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You saved a lot of lives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I could have evacuated the cities hours ago. (beat) You know, when I flew in the Gulf War everything is simple.  We knew what we had to do.  It's not simple anymore, Connie.  A lot of people died today.  How many didn't have to? Constance realizes there's no comforting him.  She supports him silently by being there.  General Grey comes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any news on my wife?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The helicopter never arrived at Nellis and there's been no radio contact. The news rocks the President.  They both know what that means.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fighters are in the air. Whitmore nods and follows the General to the back of the plane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - AIR FORCE ONE Military Command has been set up on Air Force One, a kind of flying NORAD.  Military and technical crew are seated at the controls.  Nimziki is already there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All satellites, microwave and ground communications with the cities are gone.  We believe we're looking at a total loss. Maintaining his composure, the President looks up at the many tracking screens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are they?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: with target; four minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five F/A-18 fighters move into frame.  As we WIDEN we REVEAL a total of 30 F/A-18s in attack formation, destination Los Angeles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve pulls a long cigar out of his breast pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jimmy crack corn, do you have victory dance?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jimmy pulls his cigar out.  Examines it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That is an affirmative.  I have victory dance. Mmmmmmm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't get premature on me, Jimmy. We don't light up 'til the Fat Lady sings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I hear you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Air sick, David holds a "barf bag" as Moishe talks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Air Force One for crying out loud.  Still he gets sick?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moishe, please, don't talk. Moishe pats his belly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Look at me, like a rock.  Good weather, bad, doesn't matter. (motions with his hands) We can go up and down, back and forth, side to side... David can't take any more of this story and takes off running for the bathroom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What I say? Constance comes over, sits next to Moishe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He still gets air sick, huh?  In all of this I didn't get the chance to thank you two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Think nothing of it, Spanky. Constance smiles, corrects him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spunky.  He told you about that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All he could think about was getting to you.  There's still love there I think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Love was never our problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All you need is love.  John Lennon.  Smart man.  Shot in the back, very sad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In the distance we can see the devastated Los Angeles, the space craft still hovering above it.  The Fighters zoom into frame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve looks down, becomes worried.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I shouldn't have left her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, big guy.  I'm sure she got out of here before it happened. Steve nods absently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's lock and load.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The center F/A-18 on the radar map begins to FLASH yellow, just under its image.  We SEE a video display of its FLIR (forward-looking infrared) targeting system, locked on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Los Angeles attack squadron has
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: missiles locked on target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Washington and New York squadrons, reporting lock on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fire at will.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An Advanced Medium-Range Air-to-Air Missile (AMRAAM) DROPS down from the underbelly of the fighter, DARTING OFF. Radar targeted, the missile BANKS hard, adjusting.  We SEE it is joined by FOURTEEN other missiles, all rocketing towards their target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The missiles are headed straight for the alien ship. Suddenly about a quarter mile before they reach it, they
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: as though blown out of the sky. When the smoke clears we see there has been zero damage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn it!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't even see them fire!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Command, Eagle One.  Switching to "sidewinders."  We're moving in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In unison these amazing birds DIVE together, realigning themselves into six groups of five, spreading out to attack different areas of the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The first attack group, Steve's, are the first to near the colossal alien craft. Simultaneously they drop their AIM-9 sidewinder missiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They reach the same quarter-mile proximity and EXPLODE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They must have some kind of protective shield surrounding their hull.  Pull up. Most of the fighters do, but one is too late and SMASHES into the ship's protective shield.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve's squadron BANKS hard, skirting the edge of the ship's protective shield. As the fighters approach, the alien ship's enormous ATTACK BAY doors OPEN.  Suddenly DOZENS OF ALIEN ATTACKERS dart out towards our fighters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Evasive maneuvers!  Check Six! Just moving away in time, our Fighters barely dodge the oncoming enemy Attackers as they FIRE a HAILSTORM of FIREPOWER (tracker bullet-like lasers) showering the sky. As Steve's plane DIVES, an Attacker follows.  Jimmy's plane pulls up behind the attacker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - HUD Jimmy's HUD has the alien attacker in his sights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got you covered, Stevie. Jimmy FIRES, another AIM-9 Sidewinder TAKES OFF.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Sidewinder overtakes the attacker as Steve ROLLS AWAY out of position.  Five yards before the sidewinder can get to the Attacker, it EXPLODES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Banks back around to get a shot.  Just as he turns, three American Fighters are BLOWN TO RIBBONS from Attacker tracer fire. The Attackers are in hot pursuit of Jimmy's fighter.  The Fighter flying next to Jimmy is DEMOLISHED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jimmy, roll right.  I'll cover. Jimmy's fighter narrowly rolls away from the tracer fire as Steve fires another Sidewinder, momentarily distracting the Attacker. Jimmy falls in line with Steve as the attackers turn on them. Both fighters jerk downwards at a ninety degree angle at MACH ONE.  Narrowly missing the ground, they bank away.  The Attackers can't follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fighter after fighter begin to disappear from the display screens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're losing them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then get them out of there. Suddenly one of the large radar display maps FIZZLES OUT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've lost the satellite. Before he can adjust, another monitor FIZZLES AWAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One by one we SEE the fighters getting TAKEN OUT.  Fireballs litter the laser-tracer fire covered skies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe we can out run them.  Follow my lead. Jimmy and Steve bank away from the craft, hit the supercruise,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: at Mach 2. Both  Jimmy and Steve are held tight against their seats, straining against the G-Force. Two Attackers spot them and follow in hot pursuit. Steve and Jimmy are flying at breakneck speeds, the attackers slowly gaining on them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jimmy, kick it!  They're gaining.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're already over Mach 2!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So push it! Readouts show the  planes flying beyond measurement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the  planes accelerate, Jimmy fights to remain conscious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stevie... I can't...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jimmy, stay with me. Jimmy slowly loses consciousness.  His fighter slows, drifting off to the right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: gain on them.  One catches up with Jimmy's fighter and FIRES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Laser-tracers SHOWER the Fighter.  It EXPLODES.  Job done, his Attacker banks away, returning to Los Angeles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No!!!! Steve's Attacker stays right with him, slowly gaining.  Steve kicks his harder, keeping the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A radar OPERATOR spots something on his screens.  He turns to Captain Watson.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have incoming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Friendly?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think so. Watson hits an alarm which ROARS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A dozen PILOTS race out onto the field, running for their planes.  Before anyone can reach them, the sky darkens with
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: who STRAFE the runway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Through the front glass of the tower we SEE the Attackers firing.  One fires directly at the tower.  Watson DIVES for cover as everything around him erupts into a gigantic
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The entire base goes up in flames.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & ATTACKER - SAME Steve looks down over the side of his fighter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - SAME Steve HITS THE BRAKES.  Surprised, the Attacker SAILS PAST. Taking the moment, Steve DIVES down INTO THE GRAND CANYON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, jerk-off.  Let's have some fun. The Attacker recovers, dives after Steve who flies dangerously close to the canyon walls.  The Attacker has trouble keeping up with him but does. Steve puts on a clinic in advanced aerobatics, banking, diving, swerving. The Attacker seems to be improving, following closer and closer. Steve ducks into smaller canyons, twisting sideways.  Still the Attacker follows close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - RUNNING LOW Near empty.  Frustrated, Steve gets pissed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn it! Steve turns down a dead and side canyon.  The Attacker is right on his tail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's see if you're fully equipped. The Fighter is on a collision course with the end of the canyon wall.  Suddenly Steve yanks his ACES II - EJECTION SEAT. Stave SAILS UPWARDS into the air. The Fighter CRASHES into the canyon wall. The Attacker can't turn in time.  He tries to pull up, over it, just misses the top of the canyon wall. As the nose of the Attacker hits the tip of the canyon wall the Attacker is FLIPPED OVER, ROLLING END OVER END over the top of the canyon. The parachute on Steve's ejection seat pops OPEN.
direction.name: direction

result.ToD: FLIPPED OVER, ROLLING END OVER END
result.heading: FLIPPED OVER, ROLLING END OVER END

direction.raw_text: Rolling end over end, the Attacker is banged up BADLY as it finally comes to a stop. Not far away, Steve has a quick, hard, landing.  Rolling over, Steve quickly pops the buckles on the chute and frees himself. He stands and looks around.  Spotting the beat up and incapacitated alien Attacker, Steve gets an angry resolved look.  He marches over to the fallen alien Attacker.  He scans it quickly, spots a type of door that has been knocked ajar. With all his might, Steve YANKS the door OPEN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the first time we get a quick glance at these aliens, an odd hybrid creature with fluctuating skeletal structure. The reason we only get a quick glance is because the moment it turns woozily towards us, Steve rears back and SLUGS HIM IN THE FACE, knocking the alien totally unconscious. His anger finally subsiding, exhaustion taking over, Steve stands over the craft, slowly withdrawing the prized Victory Dance cigar.  He lights it and takes a long angry puff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now that's a close encounter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's dark.  The hole Jasmine had entered is now blocked.  She pushes but it won't budge.  Exhausted, she ignites her lighter to get a better look around. As it lights we SEE that we are inside a maintenance garage. Jasmine rushes over to a phone but the line is dead.  Taking Dylan by the hand she moves to the large garage doors but she can't open them. She turns around and see a large maintenance truck, a huge land-mover shovel attached to the front.  She smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With a ROAR the large door BLAST APART as the maintenance truck SMASHES through.  Once out, Jasmine hits the brakes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DEVASTATED L.A. Total devastation.  Remnants of cars and buildings smoldering. Three scattered survivors crawl from the wreckage.  A nightmare of destruction.  The space craft above, slowly leaving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mommy, what happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, badly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see dozens of trailers packing up their gear, some already on the road.  Miguel talks with one of the drivers, then hurries away, running.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Russell wipes down Troy's forehead, he's burning up.  Alicia brings over a cold compress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, you're just like your mother.  She was stubborn too.  I had to twist her arm to get her to take her medicine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, Dad. (beat; scared) I'm not goin to die like mom, am I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're going to be fine. Miguel comes rushing in, pulls Russell aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't find anything. Everyone is packing up, they're leaving.  Word is a space ship is heading this way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We should leave too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a group heading south, they said there's a hospital just a couple hours away.  I think we should follow them. Russell nods in agreement.  A knock on the door.  Alicia turns to find a handsome young boy, PHILIP in the doorway holding a bottle of pills.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Penicillin.  At least it will help keep his fever down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's really nice of you to help us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wish I could do more but we're moving out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going with you.  I mean, we're going too.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cool. Alicia nods, smitten.  Philip smiles charmingly and leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back in the passenger section, the President sits with General Grey and Chief of Staff Nimziki.  The Technician from the command module is briefing them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They must be targeting our satellites.  We've lost all satellite communication, tracking and mapping.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have NORAD relay intelligence to our on board computers? The Technician nods and exits.  Defeated, the President slumps sullenly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've moved as many of our forces away from the bases as possible but we've already sustained heavy losses. The President nods his approval absently.  Coming out of the bathroom, David overhears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I spoke with the Joint Chief when they arrived at NORAD.  They agree, we must launch a counter offensive with a full nuclear strike.  Hit 'em with everything we've got.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Above American soil?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we don't strike soon, there may not be much of an America left to defend. The Technician returns, his face is white with fear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's the latest from NORAD?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gone, sir.  They've taken out
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's impossible...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My God, the Vice President and the Joint Chiefs...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President, we must launch.  A delay now would be more costly than when you waited to evacuate the cities! That stings the President.  He considers the option.  David is shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't be seriously considering firing nuclear weapons?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David, don't... David pushes past her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you fire nukes, so will the rest of the world.  Do you know what that kind of fall out will do?  How many innocent people... The General gets up running interference.  Constance tries to pull David back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, i remind you that you are just a guest here...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David, please...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is insanity!  You'll kill us and them at the same time. There'll be nothing left!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sit down and shut up! Suddenly Moishe is on his feet, interrupting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't tell him to shut up!  You'd all be dead, were it not for my David.  You didn't do anything to prevent this! As everyone is about to besiege Moishe, the President tries to calm him down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, there wasn't much more we could have done.  We were totally unprepared for this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't give me unprepared!  Since nineteen fifty whatever you guys have had that space ship, the thing you found in New Mexico.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad, please...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was it, Roswell?  You had the space ship, the bodies, everything locked up in a bunker, the what is it, Area fifty one .  That's it! Area fifty one.  You knew and you didn't do nothing! For the first time in along time, President Whitmore smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Regardless of what the tabloids have said, there were never any space crafts recovered by the government.  Take my word for it, there is no Area 51 and no recovered space ship. Chief of Staff Nimziki suddenly clears his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, excuse me, Mr. President, but that's not entirely accurate. The President and General Grey turn to Nimziki, shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: laying across the roadway.  Suddenly SMASH, Jasmine's maintenance truck BLASTS through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With the massive devastation in the b.g., Jasmine drives the maintenance truck down the highway.  In the back, the few survivors she's found. In the back, four INJURED PASSENGERS lay across the flatbed as a thin, older man, TEDDY tends to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jasmine spots a TALL MAN, his closes in tatters RUNNING down the highway, his arms in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The end has come!  He speaketh his word and the end hast come! Jasmine pulls up along side him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hop on.  We're heading out to El Toro.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot defy what has come, it is the end! The tall man moves off, screaming to the heavens.  As Jasmine watches him drift away she SEES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still smoldering from the crash.  A woman can be seen inside, still alive.  Jasmine jumps out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me a hand. Teddy joins Jasmine as they pry open the door.  Inside, the pilots have been killed, but Mrs. Whitmore, THE FIRST LADY , lays there in great pain, blood across her blouse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get her out of here. They erase her from the wreckage, laying her on the ground.  Dylan comes over, standing next to his mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's bleeding pretty bad. Suddenly we HEAR the CLICKING of a rifle COCKING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's got the key? Jasmine turns and see a REDNECK leveling his rifle at her. Behind him a small damaged sports car pulls up, packed to the gills with stolen, looted appliances.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like I've solved our transportation problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, you're welcome to come with us.  We're leaving here anyway...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not.  Give me the key. (yelling back) Get 'em off. Two GUYS rush from their vehicle over to the maintenance truck, pulling the injured off the tailback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Repent!  Sinners!  Repent!  The end hast come! Running up from behind, the Tall Man comes over screaming. The Redneck turns his gun on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back off.  This ain't your business. As the Redneck is distracted, Jasmine spots the bag of fireworks protruding out of Dylan's back pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You cannot go against the word, brother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure I can. The Redneck SHOOTS the Tall Man.  His buddies laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now give me that key, bitch. As he turns back to Jasmine, Boomer starts BARKING wildly. Just as he turns to shoot the dog, Jasmine lights a key ROCKET from the fireworks bag.  The rocket BLASTS into the Redneck, his shirt IGNITING ON FIRE. The Redneck drops the rifle, attempting to put out the flames, his cronies rush to his aid.  Jasmine picks up the gun, moves in on them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This "bitch" was born in  Alabama with a Daddy who loved to hunt. (cocking the weapon) So don't think for one second that I don't know how to use this. She FIRES the rifle.  Quickly the rednecks scamper away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dragging a heavy bundle wrapped in his parachute, Steve marches across the desert floor.  The alien ARM/TENTACLE dangles out of the parachute. Exhausted, Steve stops to wipe his brow.  He hears something, turns around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Several hundred of the trailers from the refugee camp are headed en mass towards him.  Smiling, Steve signals them. The trailers pull up on either side, surrounding him.  Miguel leans out of his trailer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Need a lift?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I flew overhead, I saw some kind of base, not far. Confused, Miguel checks his map.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not on the map.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trust me, it's there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Flying over the desert, Air Force One sails over an immense valley, Area 51 below - hangars, a few buildings, a small air strip, not much. Super: N.I.A. Base - "Area 51", Nevada
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Air Force One lands.  Wheels touch down, skid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The large hangar doors open and Air Force One is rolled inside.  The President and his entourage are met by a contingent of base personnel led by field operative, LT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .  He escorts them to a side hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lt. Mitchell walks over to an odd wall switch as the President and his entourage wait in the center of the hall.  With a loud hydraulic HUM, the entire hallway begins to SINK DOWN, an enormous ELEVATOR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why the hell wasn't I told about this place?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two words, Mr. President. Plausible deniability. General Grey shoots Nimziki a pissed off look.  When the elevator stops, a door SLIDES open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stepping out of the elevator, they walk into a large state of the art, sterile clean research facility.  It is amazingly well staffed and organized.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't understand.  Where did all this come from?  How did this get funded?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't think they actually spent ten thousand dollars for a hammer and thirty thousand for a toilet seat, did you? The President shoots him a look.  They are greeted by a group of SCIENTISTS in whit coats led by, DR. OKUN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President, I'd like to introduce you to Dr. Okun.  He's been heading up our research here for the last fifteen years. Dr. Okun is an odd, hyper-energetic man who's spent too much time in isolation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President, a real pleasure. They don't let us out much, you you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, I guess you'd like to see the big tamale?  Follow me. They walk up a ramp at the end of the room.  Large heavily enforced doors SLIDE open.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The group steps inside and nearly gasps at...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just like the one that chased Steve.  The entourage stares in horror and wonder.  We can SEE the patch-work repairs they've made on the ship over the years.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's a beaut, ain't she? Moishe leans close to David and Constance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never any space ships recovered by the government, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've had this for forty years and you don't know anything about them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hell no, we know tons about them. The nearest stuff has only happened in the last few days. The President slowly walks around the ship as Okun talks. David, mouth agape, just stares at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See, we can't duplicate their type of power so we've never been able to experiment.  But since these guys started showing up, all the gizmos inside turned on.  The last twenty four hours have been really exciting!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People are dying out there.  I don't think "exciting" is the word I'd choose to describe it! The room goes silent, letting the President blow off steam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What can you tell us about the enemy we're facing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not all too dissimilar to us. Breathes oxygen, comparable tolerances to heat, cold...probably why they're interested in our planet. (suddenly excited) Hey, you wanna see them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lights slowly TURN ON, illuminated the vault.  Okun leads the group to a sealed partition.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is vault, or as some of us have come to call it, the "freak show." Okun hits a switch and the sealed partition lifts revealing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - ALIENS Three dead aliens float in the milky formaldehyde tanks.  The murky fluid and condensation obstructs our view.  What we do see is not pretty.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When we found them they were wearing bio-mechanical suits. Once we got them off, we were able to learn a great deal about their anatomy; eyes, ears, bipolar digestive system... no vocal cords though.  We're assuming they communicate with each other through other means. David cannot contain his fascination.  He steps forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of other means?  Hand signals, body language?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Some kind of extra sensory perception.  Telepathy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can they be killed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These three died in the crash. Their bodies are as frail as our own.  You just have to get past their technology, which is, I'm sorry to say, far more advanced. The President turns to David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You unlocked a part of that technology.  You cracked their code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All I did was stumble onto their signal.  I don't know how helpful I can be...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Show them what you've discovered. Work together.  We've got to find a way to beat them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four armed GUARDS watch the gate.  An armada of trucks and trailers heads right for them.  They move into position to block their entrance as a blue pick-up skids to a halt before them.  Steve stands up from the back of the pick up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, Lt. Colonel, I can't open the gates without clearance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to see my clearance? Impatiently Steve grabs the Guard by the collar, pulling him over the side of the truck putting him face to face with the bundled parachute in the flatbed.  Steve rips the fabric aside revealing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still unconscious, the alien stirs.  The Guard JUMPS BACK, shitting in his pants.  Quickly he signals for the other to open the gate. The armada quickly drives past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Total darkness.  Suddenly light pours in as a  door is open. We see the faces of Okun, David and three technicians all peering at us with inquisitive expressions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See the gizmos flashing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - INSIDE ALIEN CRAFT Sure enough, tons of gizmos with lights flashing.  High tech meets organic organisms.  This alien ship looks familiar to our own technology and completely different at the same time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've been working around the clock trying to get a fix on all this crap.  Some stuff we figured out right away. David climbs in, fascinated.  He touches everything.  Okun points to everything as he describes it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This thing we're pretty sure is the life support for the cabin, this do-hickey over here is connected with the engines, this crap...we have no idea what that stuff is for. David is transfixed by it.  He stares at the small screens with flashing light patterns on them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But this over here is clearly what they use to navigate and guide the craft. But David still stares at the small screens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone grab my laptop for me? One of the technicians rushes off as Okun leans close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find something interesting?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe. The technician hands David his retrieved laptop which he quickly flips open and turns on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These patterns here, they're repeating sequentially, just like... David turns his laptop around for Okun to see.  The pattern on David's laptop flashes identically as the alien screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...their countdown signal.  Their using this frequency for computer communications.  It's how they co- ordinate their ships.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know, you're really starting to make us look bad. The two men exchange a smile.  Another TECHY pops his head inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They got one!  They got one, alive!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bundled alien lays on a stretcher that's wheeled quickly into the hall.  Okun and his staff surround it.  Trailing behind them is Steve, Russell and Miguel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long has it been unconscious?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me Doctor...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three hours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get him into containment, stat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My boy is very sick, he needs immediate attention. Okun ignores Russell, hitting the elevator switch on the wall, the room begins its hydraulic HUM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's dying out.  I want him sprayed down with saline. Russell SLAMS his fist against the switch, the room stops.  He
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: a doctor nearby, gets in his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My boys is slipping into a diabetic coma.  If you don't do something about it right now he will die. Miguel is surprised and proud of Russell as he holds DOCTOR ISAACS, meaning business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: O'Haver, Miller, come with me. (to Russell) Take us to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Headlights pierce the darkness as the maintenance truck rolls to a stop.  Jasmine climbs down out of the truck, her face ashen. She walks past a sign reading: El Toro Marine Corps Air Station.  Tears begin to roll from her eyes.  We follow her gaze to see...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The entire facility is smoldering, the last remnants of the fire burning itself to extinction.  Jasmine is devastated.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: EXT.
location: EL TORO MARINE CORPS AIR STATION

direction.raw_text: General Grey and Nimziki are in a heated argument.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were the head of the National Intelligence Agency!  You knew all about this.  When were you planning on informing the rest of us!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It had been deemed classified.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Christ, why didn't you say anything about this when they first arrived?  You could have warned us before we launched a counter attack that cost us hundreds of American pilots! Just then the President enters along with Constance and some other ADVISORS.  He examines a paper map of the United States, tacked to the wall, each major city circled in black.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Atlanta, Chicago and Philadelphia, destroyed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And there are scattered reports of sightings over Miami, Ft. Worth, And Memphis. The President and his team take seats at the large conference table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've learned that NATO and western allied installations were the firs to be taken out.  We were next.  They knew exactly where and how to hit us. Grey sneaks an accusatory glare at Nimziki.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And our forces?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're down to approximately fifteen percent, Sir. (beat) If you calculate the time it takes them to destroy a city and move on, we're looking at world wide destruction of every major city within the next thirty six hours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're being exterminated. The room is quiet.  Constance runs her fingers through her hair.  The door to the room opens and Lt. Mitchell enters with Steve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President, this is Lt. Colonel Steven Hill. The President quickly gets to his feet, anxiously shaking Steve's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lieutenant, congratulations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is the prisoner now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have him in isolation.  The doctors are very hopeful he will survive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd like to see him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir. The General is concerned but the President is determined. They head for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General, I'm anxious to get back to El Toro.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't anyone tell you?  I'm sorry.  El Toro was destroyed in the attack. Steve is shattered, he had no idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The injured are gathered around a small camp fire.  Jasmine walks up, dumping a box full of charred can goods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These should last us a while. As Margaret tries to move, she winces in pain.  Jasmine rushes to her aid.  The color from her face drained, Margaret looks like she's taking a turn for the worse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't move.  Stay still. Jasmine adjusts the bandages as Margaret turns and see Dylan curled up next to Boomer, too adorable.  Slowly he starts to wake up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's my angel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Was his father stationed here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wasn't his father.  I was kinda hoping he'd want the job, though. Jasmine becomes sad, remembering.  Margaret changes the subject.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, what do yo do for a living?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a dancer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?  Ballet?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.  Exotic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.  Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be.  I'm not.  It's good money. (re: Dylan) 'Side, he's worth it. The bandages changed, Jasmine sits down next to Margaret.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And when the dancing's over?  What about your future?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Funny, it used to scare me when I thought about the future. (looking around) Guess it doesn't really matter anymore. Dylan comes walking over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dylan, come here.  I want you to meet the First Lady.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you didn't recognize me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't want to say anything.  I voted for the other guy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okun and two Medical assistants examine the alien creature. His arms and chest have been strapped down to the examining table. For the first time we get a good look at the head of this creature, long tentacled-type cords interlocked, covering the face.  The doctors attach clamps to each of the cords.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone ready? The doctors exchange nervous glances, nod to each other.  At the same moment all they pull on the clamps, unraveling the interlocked cords.  As the cords unravel, we SEE that this is in fact a bio-mechanical SUIT as we REVEAL...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beneath the cords lay the unconscious face of the alien, his skin translucent, his body fluids, capillaries, muscle tissue, alien's skin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do we have life support monitors recording?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes.  If we fuck up it'll all be on tape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can we get some ventilation in here?  I can't take this smell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They've conquered space travel but not b.o. As Okun begins to put on a pair of surgical gloves he suddenly grabs his forehead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.  It's just that stink gives me a headache.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's moving! Instantly everyone's attention is riveted to the arm of the alien as it moves beneath the sheet.  Unseen by the others the alien creature's EYES OPEN . Another SHARP PAIN hits Okun who SCREAMS, stumbling backwards grabbing his head.  The others turn in surprise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly SPRINGS up, the restraining straps SNAPPING.  Before Med #2 can react, one of the alien's tentacles SMASHES her across the face.  She is sent sprawling backwards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Standing before her.  In a wink of an eye, he ATTACKS, leaping on her. Together they TUMBLE back into a formaldehyde tank.  Hoses are ripped from their sides and STEAM pours out.  We get quick glimpse of their struggle as the steam engulfs them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mitchell leads the Presidential party down the hall.  They turn and enter the Medical lab.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The group slows as they enter the room.  They see the containment room through the glass is covered with white steam.  Nothing can be seen.  It's eerily quiet. Cautiously they approach.  Suddenly Okun is SLAMMED AGAINST the glass partition, the creature's tentacles wrapped around him.  Pressed firmly to the glass, his eyes are shut, his expression pained, but when he speaks the voice is angry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Release...me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open the door.  Get him out of there. Suspicious, General Grey stops him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait. (to Okun) Can you hear me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Will kill...release me.  Now! They follow the tentacles with their eyes, up to the ceiling of the containment tank.  Suddenly the alien LEAPS DOWN, startling them, landing before them behind the glass. We see he's holding Okun against the glass, speaking THROUGH HIM.  This is the first real good look we get at the this bizarre creature.  Everyone in the room is repulsed and compelled by it at the same time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Through the hundreds of campers and trailers parked outside, Steve runs past until he reaches the open tarmac. A transport helicopter sits on the edge of the landing area. Steve runs up to it and climbs inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve quickly starts it engines, preparing to take off.  A SOLDIER rushes over to the cockpit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell are you doing?  Get out of there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm just going to borrow it. The Soldier pulls out his pistol, taking aim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No you're not, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You really want to shoot me? Steve stares the Soldier down.  Reluctantly he lowers his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit.  I'm gonna catch the hell for this. Steve smiles and gives him a quick salute then TAKES OFF. Quickly the bird RISES UP and darts off into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President has moved closer to the glass and is talking with the alien.  The alien uses Okun like a ventriloquist's dummy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did you people come here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Air...water...your "sun."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where do your people come from? (no answer) Where is your home?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here...now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And before here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Many worlds...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can we negotiate a truce?  is there room for co-existance? (no answer) Can there be peace between us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peace?  No peace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do you want us to do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Die. The Alien moves closer to the glass staring at the President. Suddenly the President clutches his head in pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We kill you...all. The pain becomes more severe and the President SCREAM OUT. There is general panic as people rush to the President's side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that glass bullet proof?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No sir. The General draws his pistol.  Mitchell and the other military officers follow his lead.  Simultaneously they all begin to
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The glass SHATTERS into a billion pieces.  The Alien is cut to ribbons, falling backwards. The President collapses.  So does Okun.  A STAFFER rushes over to Okun, checks his pulse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's dead. General Grey moves to the President who slowly recovers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President, are you okay? Woozily the President sits up, a strange look in his eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He wanted me to understand.  He communicated with me. (turning to Grey) They're like locusts.  They travel from planet to planet, their whole civilization.  After they've consumed every natural resource they move on.  And we're next. The President stands with a new resolve.  He stares at the dead alien on the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prepare a nuclear strike.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The research staff are working near the recovered alien attacker.  Constance comes rushing in.  She looks around for David.  Through the glass of one of the offices she sees him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holding a bottle of Jack Daniels, David fishes through a small refrigerator as Constance enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just my luck, no ice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I take it you've heard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A toast to the end of the world. David toasts her with the bottle, takes a swig.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He didn't come to this decision lightly. David nods, he doesn't want to argue.  He smiles cynically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You still believe in him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's a good man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better be.  You left me for him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wanted a career.  Didn't you ever want to be part of something special? David stares daggers at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was part of something special. Constance realizes he means their marriage.  She's hurt him and can see it.  She turns and leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A black shadow is vaguely seen in the dark night.  As we pass some moonlit clouds we recognize the shadow is, in fact, a B-2 STEALTH BOMBER. As we WIDEN, we see that the bomber is part of a squadron of eight.  These mighty winged giants fly together in attack formation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A tracking screen comes to life, eight blips flashing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got the AWAC on line. Signals coming in low. The President's group takes their position behind the technicians.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The eight B-2 Stealth Bombers break formation, each heading off to their different target destinations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On a large map, we see the eight target destinations and the planes heading for them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who will we reach first?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Houston, Texas.  Intercept ETA, six minutes and counting down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my God, Houston.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The major cities have been deserted.  Civilian casualties should be at a minimum, sir. One map screen, ENLARGES, tracking the bomber on route to Houston.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looters take all they can carry through the broken glass store front.  A large heavily armored TANK rolls up front.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nervous military technicians work equipment as their TANK COMMANDER pulls down a periscope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Through the periscopes cross-hairs we SEE downtown Houston, the City Destroyer space ships settling in above it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Silhouetted against the shimmering waters on the bay, they Stealth Bomber can be seen as it approaches Houston.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The flight crew works their computers (similar readouts are seen at command center).  The Multi-Function Display (MFD) flashing before each crew member.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have laser targeting locked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #1 Target is locked, sir.  Do you wish to deploy? Everyone turns to the President who does not answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President, do you wish to deploy. Still there is no answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deploy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bay doors open and a large Tactical Nuclear Cruise Missile drops down, flies parallel with the bomber as it adjusts its radar and laser tracking.  Suddenly it SHOOTS OFF. The bomber BANKS AWAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see the horizon twisting away as we bank off from target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the big map we see one FLASHING target line tracking the missile as it approaches Houston.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: May our children forgive us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Tank Commander readjusts the periscope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: & B-2 STEALTH BOMBER We follow the Cruise Missile as it guides itself on a direct collision course with the space craft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The targeting map shows how close the missile is, nearly on top of the target.  Everyone in the room holds their breath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The nuke speeds closer.  It HITS the protective shield and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .  A FLASH OF LIGHT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With the B-2 Stealth Bomber in the foreground, the city behind it vanishes in a FLASH OF LIGHT, blinding us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can see the extent of the explosion on the targeting map, tracking it -- an expanding ring around Houston.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a hit! The others are still waiting.  The monitor shows the night vision picture of the growing MUSHROOM CLOUD rising above the city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The MUSHROOM CLOUD engulfs the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rocked by the massive explosion, the shock wave ROCKS the armored tank but doesn't destroy it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The men inside are KNOCKED around, hard from the explosion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We got the bastards! General Grey shoots Nimziki a look.  The President holds up a hand, silencing the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can they see it?  Did it destroy the target?
direction.name: direction

result.heading: THE SPACE CRAFT IS STILL THERE,

direction.raw_text: THROUGH PERISCOPE - SAME As the cloud begins to dissipate we see THE SPACE CRAFT IS STILL THERE, completely unharmed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Negative.  Target remains.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the monitors as well, we can see the target remain.  The air is let out of the room, everyone deflated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call them back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The other bombers might have more luck.  We shouldn't just give up...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said call them back. As the technicians call the bombers away, the President sinks into a depression.  His last hope of survival gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jasmine keeps Margaret company as the rest sleep around the last flames of their campfire.  From the worried expression on Jasmine's face we can tell that Margaret has gotten worse, her wounds bleeding badly.
direction.name: direction

location: EL TORO MARINE CORPS AIR STATION
result.heading: EXT.

direction.raw_text: kicks up, the sound of an ENGINE approaching.  Jasmine squints her eyes looking up into the wind when a BRIGHT LIGHT engulfs her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bright lights in the sky growing nearer.  Slowly the others begin to wake up, frightened as the lights INTENSIFY. The others slowly begin to retreat but Jasmine stands, staring defiantly.  A smile creeps across her face as she sees that the lights belong to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Transport Helicopter touches down and Steve leaps out, racing towards Jasmine.  Overwhelmed, Jasmine jumps into his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know how I like to make a big entrance. They kiss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The double doors burst open as the President carrying his young daughter marches through.  Doctor ISAACS comes over to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How is she?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, Mr. President.  If only we could have gotten to her sooner. The President puts his daughter down as he sees...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Margaret lays in bed, doctors and nurses surrounding her. Patricia rushes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's bleeding internally. There's nothing else we can do. Stunned, the President watches as Patricia hugs her mother.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hiya Munchkin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mommy, we were worried.  We didn't know where you were.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm right here, baby. Recovering, the President nods for the doctors to leave the room.  As they begin to march out, he makes his way over to his wife and daughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey, why don't you wait outside so Mommy can get some rest. Patricia kisses her mother, says goodbye and leaves.  Out of sight, Margaret winces, fading away.  The President grabs her hand for support.  She squeezes tightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm scared, Tom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay.  The doctors said you're going to be just fine. Margaret smiles at the man she knows all too well.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Liar. The look between them says more than any words.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President exits the room, overcome with emotion. Constance, the doctors and some medical crew move to comfort him.  He holds them off with a gesture. He looks up and sees Jasmine, Steve and Dylan down the hall. He pushes through the crowd and makes his way over to them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm so sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I just wanted to thank you. You're a very brave woman. Across the hall, Patricia sits in a chair, waiting.  Whitmore walks over to her and kneels down next to his small child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is Mommy sleeping now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, baby.  Mommy's sleeping.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Topples over with a BANG!  A foot steps in and starts kicking trash all over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David is drunkenly knocking everything over, making a gigantic mess.  Moishe comes up behind, restraining him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David, David!  What the hell are you doing!?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm making a mess.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This I can see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've gotta burn the rain forest, Pops.  Dump toxic waste, pollute the air, rip up the ozone.  Maybe if we screw this planet up enough they won't want it anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David, you're drunk. David slips, falls on his ass, hard.  Moishe helps him back up on his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think you better sleep this off. Go back inside before you catch a cold. Slowly David looks up towards Moishe, an idea.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pops, you're a genius!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What'd I say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A cold?  Of course. Sobered, David jumps kisses his father and bolts inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A large crowd has been gathered here at the lab.  General Grey and Nimziki walk up to Constance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, Connie, we're here. What's this all about?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I really have no idea.  He just said to bring everyone down here. Steve shows Dylan the alien space craft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does that thing fly in outer space? Steve loos up at the craft admiringly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It certainly does. When the President enters a technician rushes over and knocks on the hatch door on the alien attacker.  The door swings open and David climbs down. Grabbing a coke can from the "recycle" trash bin, David places the empty can on top of the alien attacker.  David turns and faces the gathering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could anyone please step back away from the craft? They do and David nods to a Technician inside the craft.  The Technician disappears inside, closing the door behind him.  A loud HUM emits from the craft.  David has to yell over it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lt. Mitchell, would you mind drawing your pistol?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From where you're standing, do you think you could shoot that can off the alien craft? Mitchell shrugs affirmatively.  David gestures for him to try. Taking aim, Mitchell SHOOTS. The bullet RICOCHETS off the attacker's protective shield. Several people in the crowd dock, afraid of being hit by the errant bullet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry 'bout that.  You see, it's protected by the craft's shields. We can't penetrate their defenses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We know that already.  What's your point? David walks over to his laptop, now connected directly to the craft by cables and starts typing furiously.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My point is if we can't beat their defenses, then we must get around them. David stops typing and stares at his wrist watch, silently counting down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lt. Mitchell, would you please try to shoot it again? Reluctantly Mitchell obliges.  This time the can is BLOWN OFF THE CRAFT.  Everyone in the room is shocked.  The Technician re-opens the craft's door and the loud HUM disappears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I gave it a cold. The President is fascinated, he steps closer.  Moishe beams proudly at his smart son.  Constance is amazed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More accurately, I gave it a virus.  A computer virus. David turns his laptop around for the President to see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you telling us you can send out a signal that will disable all their shields?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just as they used our satellites against us, we can use their own signal against them. David walks over to a diagram he's made showing the relationship between the Mother Ship, the Space Crafts and the smaller alien attackers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we plant the virus directly into the mother ship, it would then filter down into all the corresponding ships below.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And just how do we infect the "Mother Ship" with a virus? David gestures to the alien attacker behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll have to fly their craft out of our atmosphere and dock with the mother ship. Intrigued Steve turns and looks back at the alien attacker, sizing it up.  David points to a satellite photo of the underbelly of the Mother Ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can enter here, upload the virus and set off an explosion that could disable it.  This would disorient the smaller ship below and buy you some time to take them out. Constance reacts, realizing David's participation in the plan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is ridiculous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long would their shields be down?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once they discover the virus it could be a matter of minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want us to co-ordinate a massive world wide counter strike with a window of only a few minutes?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With their shields down it might be possible.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please, you're not buying into any of this nonsense, are you?  We don't have the manpower or the resources to launch that kind of a campaign. (gesturing to the alien ship) Not to mention that this whole cockamamie plan is dependent on a machine that no one in the world is qualified to operate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't say that, sir. Everyone turns to Steve who steps through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen them in action.  I've watched their maneuvers.  With your permission, sir, I'd like the opportunity to try.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That thing's a wreck.  It crash landed back in the fifties!  We don't even know if it's capable of flying. David turns to the Technicians.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remove the clamps! Technicians move to the large holding clamps on either side of the craft.  With a loud CLANK, the clamps are pulled away. For a moment the hulking craft TEETERS unevenly, but quickly stabilizes, FLOATING ABOVE THEM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any other questions? Everyone stares at the floating ship with wonder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's do it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Constance, General Grey and the President are walking down the hall.  Nimziki rushes to catch up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand that you're upset over the death of your wife but that's no excuse for making another fatal mistake... The President whirls, grabs Nimziki and SLAMS him against the wall.  Holding him tight, the President gets in his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The only mistake I made was appointing a sniveling little weasel like you Chief of Staff. Constance is about to intervene when General Grey stops her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But this is a mistake, I am thankful to say, I do not have to live with.  Mr. Nimziki, you're fired. The President releases him and turns to General Grey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Organize every plane you can find and get some Goddamned pilots to fly them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, Sir. He storms off leaving everyone stunned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He can't do that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He just did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Four BRITISH AIR PILOTS are gathered around a table going over a map.  One pilot, REGINALD, is in charge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...we've been told that there may be additional re-enforcement in hiding near the Golan Straights... Suddenly the flap to the tent opens.  All the pilots draw their pistols frightening the ARAB PILOT who stands in the doorway.  The Arab Pilot speaks quickly in Arabic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell's he saying?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Seems they're getting a signal. One Morse code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As they step out of the tent we SEE more than a HUNDRED FIGHTERS PLANES from different nations parked around them. They've all gone into hiding out here in the desert, divided into many smaller camps. Reginald and Thomson follow their Arab cohort, walking through the many other campsites.  Thomson gets some stares from the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I still get believe this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Iraqis don't appear altogether too pleased with this arrangement.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you think the Israelis feel? Sure enough a campsite of ISRAELI PILOTS sits very near by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dozens of Arab pilots are gathered around a large radio as the Morse code comes through.  Thomson quickly kneels down, taking notes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's from the Americans.  They want to organize a counter offensive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's about bloody time.  What do they plan to do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Several Russian Pilots are gathered around a radio, their dozen MIG FIGHTERS standing behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They claims to be able to bring down their shields.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When do they want to attack?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: At the base of a large Volcano in Fuji, several Japanese attack helicopters stand near their pilots, gathered around a radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The attack begins in thirteen hours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A large world map has been constructed.  Several sites are marked with stickers reading: COMBAT READY.  Another sticker is put onto Mr. Fuji. Striding in, the President surveys the war room.  General Grey rushes over to meet him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How're we doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better than we thought. General Grey leads the President over to the wall map.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have confirmed divisions of troops from different armies all around the world.  Most of Europe, the Middle East and Asia are battle ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And our troops here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've been collecting planes from all over but...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what, General?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pilots, sir.  We don't have enough people to get them in the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then find them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Troy is sleeping peacefully in his bed.  Russell sits at the kitchen table as Miguel enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How' he doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just fell asleep.  He's gonna be just fine.  Join me in a little celebration? Russell holds up his bottle of Jack Daniels.  Clearly he's been drinking again.  Miguel is crestfallen.  Pissed he turns and storms out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miguel.  Don't be mad.  Miguel! Drunkenly, Russell chases after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Making his way through the campers, Russell SEES a group of refugees around some MILITARY OFFICERS who addresses them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...We're planning to launch a counter offensive... Russell wanders over towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...with our depleted manpower we must ask that anyone with any flight experience come forward. Military training is preferable but anyone who can fly a plane could be useful... Russell pushes his way through the crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can fly, I mean, I'm a pilot. The officer just stares at the bottle of Jack Daniels still in his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry, sir. Russell gets into his face, desperate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't understand.  I've gotta be part of this.  This is important to me.  They ruined my life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why don't you go somewhere and sleep it off. The Officers move on, taking a few volunteers with them. Russell watches them go, dejected.  Angrily, he throws the bottle of Jack, SMASHING it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A large MISSILE slides back into a LAUNCHER that has been attached to the top of the alien attacker.  Some workers PAINT over the patch-work repairs.  Below, Mitchell briefs Steve and David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've hid the launcher in the ship's manifold. Mitchell takes a small black box from a table near by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This will be attached to the ships main console.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's just like an AMRAAM launch pad on the stealths.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly.  Use it the same way. Only the nuke won't detonate on impact.  You'll have another thirty seconds to get as far away as you can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll see how they're doing with the radio transmitter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh shit, we're late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll meet you there. Steve dashes off as David moves toward the attacker. Constance has been eavesdropping.  She walks to David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thirty seconds?  Isn't that cutting it a little too close?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll be well on our way out of there before we shoot that thing off. David leans under the attacker where a TECHNICIAN is attaching another device.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the strongest SHF transmitter we could get.  It'll tell us when you've uploaded the virus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then cross your fingers the shields go down. David turns and walks away, Constance following.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With you?  I don't understand why you can't just show someone how to plant the virus, somebody trained for this kind of mission?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If anything goes wrong I'll have to think quickly, adjust the signal, who knows? David stops, picking up a small trash can labelled "recycle."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know how I'm always trying to save the planet.  This is my chance. David rushes off.  Constance watches him leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now he gets ambitious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jasmine is kneeling as Dylan tries to zip up the back of her dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's too tight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had to borrow it.  I guess that's good enough. Jasmine stands, turns to Dylan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do I look? She looks great.  But Dylan only gives her the "so-so" hand gesture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a lot of help. The door behind her flies open and Steve marches in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're late.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, you like to make a big entrance. Steve moves next to Jasmine, takes her hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before we do this, I want you to know I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry for what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I should have done this a long long time ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have the ring? As we REVERSE ANGLE we see that we are in a military CHAPEL, a large crucifix on the wall.  A CHAPLAIN stands by the altar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bet. Steve pulls out the famous "dolphin" ring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Witnesses? Just then the doors open and David and Constance enter taking seats on opposing sides of the aisle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then let's get this show on the road. Steve and Jasmine take their places at the altar.  Jasmine is radiant.  Dylan rushes up and joins them. As the ceremony begins, David and Constance share a pregnant glance.  Slowly they reach across the aisle and hold hands as Steve and Jasmine exchange their vows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - PRE-DAWN Slowly spread apart revealing the myriad of different planes that have been gathered.  Pilots, flights crews and refugees prepare for the battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Walking out the President scans the motley collection of planes; old, new, high-tech, low-tech.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Beggars can't be choosers, sir. Nodding in agreement, the President walks among the rank and file.  Slowly they turn their attention to the President.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Good morning.  In less than one hour planes from here and all around the world will launch the largest aerial battle in the history of mankind... (beat) Mankind.  The word has new meaning for all of us now.  We are reminded not of our petty differences but of our common interests. Constance, David and Moishe join the group, listening.  Even David is moved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps it's fate that today, July the Fourth, we will once again fight for our freedom.  Not from tyranny, persecution or oppression.  But from annihilation.  We're fighting for our right to live, to exit.  From this day on, the fourth day of July will no longer be remembered as an American holiday but as the day that all of mankind declared we will not go quietly into the night.  We will not vanish without a fight.  We will live on.  We will survive. The crowd erupts into applause and cheers.  The President turns and walks over to an Officer holding a bundle of clothes.  General Grey confronts the President as he begins to disrobe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. President, just what do you think you're doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm a pilot, Will.  This is where I belong. General Grey wants to argue but can't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Constance and David embrace as Steve turns to Dylan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I'm back we'll light those fireworks. Jasmine hugs them both as Moishe walks over to David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David, take these. David looks down at the "barf bags" in Moishe's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thanks, Pops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want you should know, I'm very proud of you, son. That means more to David than Moishe could have known.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Be careful. Constance hugs David as Steve suddenly freaks out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn it.  We can't go yet.  I gotta find some cigars. Steve is about to bolt when Moishe grabs him, retrieving two cigars from his coat pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My last two.  With my blessings.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a lifesaver. Steve grabs them and climbs inside.  David smiles awkwardly, then follows Steve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hatch shuts and David takes a seat next to Steve who hands him one of the cigars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on to this.  For our victory dance.  But not 'til we hear the fat lady sing. Reluctantly David takes it.  As he does Steve notices the "barf bag" on David's lap.  Off Steve's look...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a confession to make.  I'm not real big on flying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Constance and Jasmine join the others behind the observation glass outside the room as the Attacker prepares for lift off. Part of the ceiling suddenly PEELS AWAY, revealing an enormous
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: leading topside.
direction.name: direction
