direction.raw_text: Strapping in and securing their equipment, Steve grabs hold of the throttle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ready?  Let' rock and roll. Steve pulls back on the throttle but the attacker swings
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Alien Attacker SMASHES BACKWARD into the rear of the lab. Moishe winces as the others react fearfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Embarrassed, Steve adjusts the throttle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oops. Like a stick shift diagram of a car, a small hand written "post it" card is pasted onto the dash.  Steve reaches over and turns it upside down, righting the problem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's try that again. This time he pushes the throttle forward and the Attacker
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shooting up into the ceiling shaft above, the Attacker ZOOMS out of the underground laboratory.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With a WHOOSH the Alien Attacker ZOOMS out of the underground shaft and SOARS into the sky.  Once high enough it goes into a wild barrel roll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just as it comes out of the roll.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just getting a feel for her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Attacker arcs upward and disappears into the clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President watches the Attacker flying away.  His canopy locks down as he adjusts his helmet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grey, you read me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roger, Eagle One, our primary target has shifted course.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: General Grey is standing by the large map tracking the alien ships over the United States.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's it headed?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think our secret is out. They're headed right for us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (filtered)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: thirty six minutes. The President gets a determined look in his eye.  He FIRES UP his engine.  Following his lead, engines ignite, canopies lock down and planes taxi to position.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The captured alien attacker soars higher and higher.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Slowly getting sick, David holds onto his "barf bag."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You still with me? David nods sheepishly.  Steve's eyes go wide with wonder as the ship climbs to the edge of our atmosphere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've waited a long time for this. The ship begins to SHAKE, rattling harshly as it climbs. Through the window we SEE the blue sky EVAPORATE.  Slowly a field of STARS take its place. This is the moment Steve had wished for all his life.  He's not disappointed.  David, however, is not so thrilled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heading further into space, ZOOMING overhead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Through the windshield we see a huge OBJECT floating in the distance, the moon behind it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it.  Head straight for it. But Steve gets distracted, something wrong with the controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Something's happening.  It's not responding. David looks over at his laptop, connected to the ship's on board computers.  Th signal is ADJUSTING.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was counting on that.  They're bringing us in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President's plane leads thirty fighters in attack formation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have visual.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fifteen mile wide space craft peeks over a mountain range headed straight for us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do not engage until we've confirmed the package has been delivered.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Constance is standing by Lt. Mitchell behind the Military cadre coordinating the battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if that thing gets here before we can plant the virus?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The entire compound is buried deep within the mountain.  It should give us some protection.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But what about all the people outside? Mitchell shoots her a worried look.  Quickly they both dash outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve and David's attacker flies towards the gigantic Mother Ship.  Hundreds of other attackers flow in and out of the Mother Ship through the many triangular portals.  Steve and David's attacker's drawn into one of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Caught in a stream of attackers, they flow through the portal shaft leading into this planet sized space craft.  They pass by enormous windows revealing the HUNDREDS OF ALIENS working within the Mother Ship. We spill out of the shaft and into a gigantic cavity stretching out beyond visibility.  Enormous TOWERS are scattered throughout.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither can believe their eyes.  Staring out the front window they SEES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ALIEN TROOP PARADE GROUND Below them THOUSANDS OF ALIENS can be seen as they are marched into dozens of enormous TROOP CONTAINERS docked at the edges of the parade grounds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Must be thousands of them.  What are they doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks like they're preparing the invasion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They pass the parade ground and head into the middle of this huge cavernous sphere, closing in on the many LANDINGS. Hundreds of attackers are docked at each one. In the center of the Landing are large BAY WINDOWS, inside is a kind of control tower.  We can SEE several ALIEN WORKERS through the glass.  Steve and David's attacker is heading straight towards them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This won't work.  They'll see before we can do anything. Lifting up another hand written card labeled "window," David pushes the button underneath.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These things are fully equipped. Reclining bucket seats, power windows...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: lowers covering the window. Slowly Steve and David's attacker lowers onto large docking
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: which LOCK ON, holding it in place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're in! David starts typing frantically.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mitchell turns from one of the consoles to General Grey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's uploading the virus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eagle One...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Presidential attack squadron zeroing in on target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...the package is being delivered. Stand by to engage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alicia struggles to drag out a large duffle bag.  Philip (the boy who brought the penicillin earlier) rushes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me get that. He grabs the bag for her.  Alicia smiles.  Miguel helps Troy down from the trailer.  As they rush away, Miguel turns to Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Russell?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - ENTRANCE TO COMPOUND Constance, Jasmine and Mitchell are helping to usher the refugees into the compound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hurry, we've got to get everyone inside. Constance looks up and SEES off in the distance...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Piercing the horizon, coming over the top of a distant mountain.  Headed this way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David finishes typing.  The screen on his laptop flashes:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The virus is in.  All we can do now is pray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (filtered) Delivery complete.  Engage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roger. The fighter jets GUN IT and overtake the smaller planes in front of them. Below the President's plane the weapons bay door opens and a long range AMRAAM Missile DROPS DOWN, computes its target and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mitchell and General Grey move over to a monitor showing visual from the Present's Plane.  They SEE the missile moving towards target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep your fingers crossed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The pilots watch nervously as the missile nears its target.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, baby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just as it gets to the shield perimeter, the missile EXPLODES. The shields are still up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They watch the missile blow up harmlessly.  Deflated, General Grey grabs his mic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It didn't work.  Disengage.  Sir, get your people out of there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President is not ready to give up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet! Below his plane another MISSILE drops down, and DARTS OFF.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: HITS THE SIDE OF THE SHIP

direction.raw_text: This one goes past the point of the previous explosion.  It moves in closer and closer.  Suddenly it HITS THE SIDE OF THE SHIP.  A HUGE EXPLOSION, rips off a part of the side of this immense ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We SEE the explosion on the monitor.  Everyone in the room
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You did it!  A direct hit!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The pilots are thrilled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're going in!  Squadron leaders, take point. The fighters break off into six group of five.  One by one, each fighter DROPS A MISSILE.  We follow DOZENS OF MISSILES on their way to the space craft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Attacker Bay doors open and DOZENS OF ALIEN ATTACKERS shoot out.  Spreading wide. Guided missiles EXPLODES as they hit the City Destroyer, damaging the outer hull.  The Attackers go after the American fighters.  The six groups split wide.  An aerial dog fight ensues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miguel searches for Russell as the refugees run for the hangar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Russell! Miguel gets swept up in the tide.  As the last of them enter the hangar, TWO ALIEN ATTACKERS arrive behind them, STRAFING the ground.  The rows of trailers homes EXPLODE one after another.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - BACK OF HANGAR Constance ushers the crowd into the elevator hallway.  Packed into the hallway together, they are panicked at the sound of the nearby explosions.  As the last one is safely inside, Constance turns back and SEES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The attackers FIRE and the front half of the hangar EXPLODES. Constance is KNOCKED back against the wall.  She activates the elevator and the room begins to SINK. As the hallway submerges, the entire hangar comes CRASHING DOWN behind them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Over monitors the General observes the aerial battle.  This room, too, ROCKS from the explosions.  The monitors FLICKER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve struggles with the controls but is getting no where.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get us out of here!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't shake her free.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Though the attacker guns its engine, the CLAMPS below HOLD TIGHT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: David moves over to the computer to see if he can help. Suddenly the large window slowly begins to DROP DOWN.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not me.  They're overriding the system. The blast shield continues to peel away.  David and Steve drop down below the dash, hiding from view.  As the view becomes unobstructed we SEE...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - THE LANDING Several Alien's looking across at us from the large bay window of the Landing's control tower.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Damn! David leans from his hiding position and SEES several other alien attackers are moving in on them.  They are surrounded .
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Check and mate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like images from England during the blitzkrieg, the refugees are huddled on the floor, the lights FLICKERING and the muted sounds of distant EXPLOSIONS.  Miguel moves through the refugees, searching for Russell. A Yarmulke is unfolded.  As it is lifted we realize Moishe is putting it on.  He holds the hands with the people around him and begins to pray.  Nimziki moves next to Moishe.  Moishe takes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not Jewish.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As another bomb rocks the room, Alicia moves closer to Philip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This could be our last night on Earth.  I don't want to die a virgin.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If we do, we'll both die virgins. But at last we'll be together. Alicia smiles, a nice guy at last.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The City Destroyer space ship is settling just above the compound as the American fighters circle it, chased by the attackers.  Below the SCHISM begins to open!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In all the commotion, no one notices as Miguel sneaks inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're running out of missiles, Sir.  We're just not causing enough damage.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (filtered) They're getting ready to fire the big gun.  You're going to have to find a vulnerable spot, fast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got an idea.  Keep 'em off my tail. Taking the advice, the President DIVES.  He's met by two flanking Fighters (EAGLES 9 & 2) as they cruise the underbelly of the City Destroyer.  Sure enough, the SCHISM is opening, preparing to fire the WALL OF DESTRUCTION.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's take 'em out before they take us out. The President locks the SCHISM hatchway into the center of his
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (heads up display).  Just as he FIRES, Eagle 9 is BLOWN OUT OF THE SKY.  It rocks the President, sending his missile off target. Off balance, the missile hits just wide of the hatchway and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rocking the entire ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm out of missiles!  Eagle 2?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm on it. But before he can target, his fighter EXPLODES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lights continue to flicker.  Jasmine grabs onto Dylan and Patricia, holding them tight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On the monitor we SEE the SCHISM, and BRIGHT LIGHTS as several fighters fly past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're out of time.  Get out of there!  Get as far away as you can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pissed, the President refuses to give up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't anyone have any damned missiles left?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry I'm late, Mr. President. The President spins and SEES darting out of the clouds...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Russell ZOOMS past the President and alien attackers, barely missing their FIRE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is that?  What are you doing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay, Sir.  I'm packin'. We SEE he has a large MISSILES propped up in the seat behind him.  A light on it flashes ARMED.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (filtered) Just keep those guys off me for a few more seconds. Hearing his voice, Miguel is shocked.  He moves closer towards the monitors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The remaining fighters lay down COVER FIRE for Russell's old bi-wing.  Russell heads directly TOWARDS THE SCHISM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everyone is gripped to the screen as we see it get closer and closer to the closing bay doors.  Miguel is aghast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do me one favor...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who is that guy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Russell! Miguel races over to the microphone, attempts to grab it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...tell my children I love them very much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Russell nears the SCHISM, a hail of alien firepower erupting around him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad!  No! Russell smiles at b being called "Dad."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got to, kid.  You were always better at taking care of them than I was anyways. Russell turns off his radio as he banks UPWARD towards the open SCHISM.  The climb is steep, and the bi-wing nearly stalls out. Suddenly the bright lights VANISH and the beam begins to form. Russell's bi-wing just makes it INSIDE THE OPEN SCHISM and disappears from view. The President and remaining fighters BANK AWAY, clearing. Suddenly, A GIGANTIC EXPLOSION, RIPS THROUGH THE CENTER OF THE SPACE CRAFT.  It's causing a CHAIN REACTION of explosion. Teetering, the entire space ship, turns away out of control.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A GIGANTIC EXPLOSION, RIPS THROUGH THE CENTER OF THE SPACE CRAFT

direction.raw_text: The room erupts in CHEERS.  Everyone, that is, except Miguel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not far away from Area 51, the enormous craft is burning from the center outwards.  Suddenly it DROPS and COLLIDES with the mountain range, EXPLODING ON IMPACT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Intercepting the celebration, General Grey moves over to a radio technician.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get on the wire.  Tell every squadron around the world how to shoot those fuckers down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sitting below the dash, Steve takes out the cigars, hands one to David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I guess there's nothing left to do.  Let's nuke 'em. David realizes they're both about to die.  He stares at the cigar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Funny, I always thought things like these would kill me. They share a quick sober laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice meeting you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You as well. Steve lights his cigar, then lights David's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ready?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Popping up from behind the dash, cigars in their mouths, Steve and David start waving "good-bye" like idiots. The Aliens in the tower don't know how to react.  The attackers move in for the kill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Think they know what's coming? He reaches down to the black box we saw before and enters the launch code.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not a chance in hell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly the missile ERUPTS from behind the manifold and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: into the control tower, SHATTERING THE GLASS WINDOW.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The missile SMASHES through the glass.  The atmosphere impeached, the aliens quickly succumb to the elements, chocking and dying. The missile BLASTS by WRECKING equipment until it LODGES into the back wall of the Landing tower. A small counter on the missile begins to count down 30:00,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rocked from the explosions, the docking clamps RELEASES and the ships jostles free.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve grabs the controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're loose!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't matter.  Game's over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't hear no fat lady. Steve THROTTLES IT.  The craft JOLTS AWAY.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve and David's attacker BLAST away, the other alien attackers follow in hot pursuit. The attackers FIRE.  Steve SWERVES avoiding the blasts as they race for the exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grasping for breath, a dying Alien looks up at the wedged in nuclear missile.  The counter reads: 00:04, 00:03, 00:02. We get the feeling the Alien knows what's coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve and David's attacker just reaches the doorway as the center of the landing EXPLODES behind them. The enormous impact, rocks some of the lagging attackers off track.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Steve DARTS his attacker out from underneath the Mother Ship's belly.  A group of attackers FOLLOW. Just as the last of them exit the docking bay, a HUGE FIREBALL erupts behind them ripping through the Mother Ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: towards us, Steve guides his ship away.  The Alien attackers in hot pursuit.  Behind them we SEE the ENTIRE MOTHER SHIP EXPLODE. The immense EXPLOSION GROWS OUTWARDS coming right at us.  The
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: are GOBBLED UP as the EXPLOSION WIDENS.  Quickly the explosion gains ground on Steve and David.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like a loose board caught in the surf, Steve and David's ship rides the edge of the explosion, getting knocked END OVER END.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tumbling ass over tea kettle, David and Steve are ROCKED in their seats.  Steve battles to regain control of the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The mammoth fireball reaches the outer edge of its zenith. Steve and David's ship is SPIT OUT, tumbling down towards
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The fighters are returning home.  Crowd RACE out of the ruins of the smoldering compound to greet them, cheering their arrival.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President is climbing out as General Grey rushes to his aid.  Behind him, Jasmine leads Dylan and Patricia, who breaks free and RUSHES to her father.  The President sweeps her up in his arms as Jasmine approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any word from Steve? Behind her, Constance rushes over, the same thing on her mind. Before he can answer they HEAR a ROAR above.  They all become silent as they turn and look to the skies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - FIREBALL The FIREBALL COMET is rapidly shooting down towards us. Suddenly BURSTING OUT OF THE FLAMES, Steve and David's ship
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Just over the heads of the cheering crowds, Steve and David's ship ZOOMS overhead, disappearing out of sight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Several army JEEPS race across the arid desert floor.  As they
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: past we see they are headed towards a gigantic BLACK PLUME OF SMOKE in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: PLUME OF SMOKE The Jeeps SKID to a halt.  Jasmine and Constance are the first to leap off the Jeeps. Steve and David walk towards us, cigars in their mouths. Jasmine races over to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You scared the hell out of me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, but what an entrance!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dick-weed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Butt-munch. Constance comes running up to David, hugs him tightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you all right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did it work?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You bet it did. She hugs him.  They kiss.
direction.name: direction
